itemDescription.document:
This gun is also known as "The Bond Gun", and therefor you must own it!
Everybody knows this gun gets the ladies attention, but a lesser known fact about this gun, is it's ability to shoot - it can actually kill the person you deploy it on, so be cautious.
9mm Kurz (.380 ACP)
665 g (23.5 oz)
Semi-automatic
it is in stainless steel, sculpted by Hattori Hanzo
